thread.section_title: Hotel Del Corso - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Week in Rome
thread.title_full: Week in Rome - Review of Hotel Del Corso, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Gerry D
title: Week in Rome
text:
Lovely boutique hotel, located on the Via Del Corso, between Piazza Venezia and Piazza Del Popolo. Excellent location, fantastic management and staff, led by Ferdinando. They could not have been more helpful and considerate.They have a beautiful roof terrace where breakfast is served.
The only drawback is there is no bar or restaurant on the premises.
